participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and social, loves to explore new experiences and enjoys being around people.
participant_1.background: I am deathly afraid of heights. I own a cat and a dog. I am a party animal. My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I help out at the food bank occasionally.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Outdoorsy and competitive, enjoys racing and meeting new people through work.
participant_2.background: I have light skin with big brown eyes. Its red with blue stripe so it shiny when I race. I wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. I waitress during the day to supplement my income.

content.text: I'm a pretty adventurous person, I like to do things that scare me. What are some of the things you like to do for fun?
I'm not so much into adventures, but I do like to race my motorcycle.
That's awesome! How long have you been racing?
I've been racing for about five years now.
That's a long time! What's the most exciting race you've ever been in?
The most exciting race I've ever been in was when I was racing in the Grand Prix.
The Grand Prix! That's amazing! How did you do?
I didn't win, but I came in second place.
That's still really impressive! I'm sure you were really proud of yourself.
I was! I'm still really proud of myself for that.
That's awesome! What do you like to do when you're not racing?
I like to work as a waitress at a local restaurant.
That's cool! I've never been a waitress before.
It's a lot of fun! I get to meet a lot of different people.
That sounds like it's a great job.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies.
I do! I like to keep busy.
That's great! I'm always looking for new things to do.
